Class ComputerDynamicStateDataConnector

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.upmc.components.connectors.DataConnectorI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataOfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataOfferedI.PushI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataRequiredI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataRequiredI.PullI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, ComputerDynamicStateDataI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ComputerDynamicStateDataConnector
extends fr.upmc.components.connectors.DataConnector
implements ComputerDynamicStateDataI
    The class ComputerDynamicStateDataConnector implements a connector for ports exchanging through the interface ComputerDynamicStateDataI.

    Description

    A standard DataConnector extended with the specific method for starting and stopping the dynamic state notification.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 15 avr. 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

                         throws java.lang.Exception

        start n>/code> pushing of computer dynamic state information and force the pushing to be done each interval period of time.

 post   true                    // no postcondition.
